contents:
Type: movie
Title: Wizard School Boy
Year: 1997
Genres: fantasy young-adult magic
Description: A boy with a lightning-shaped scar discovers he is a wizard and attends a secret magic school, where he makes friends and confronts a dark sorcerer.

Type: book
Title: Ring-Bearing Hobbit
Year: 1954
Genres: fantasy epic adventure
Description: A timid hobbit inherits a cursed ring and joins a small fellowship on a dangerous journey to a volcanic mountain to destroy it before a dark lord regains his power.

Type: movie
Title: Zombies on a Train
Year: 2016
Genres: horror action zombies
Description: Passengers on a high-speed train must fight for survival when a sudden viral outbreak turns people into ravenous zombies during the journey.

Type: game
Title: Mall of the Dead
Year: 2006
Genres: horror action zombies
Description: A group of survivors barricades itself inside a shopping mall and improvises weapons from everyday items to battle endless waves of the undead.

Type: game
Title: Foggy Town Nightmare
Year: 1999
Genres: horror psychological mystery
Description: A desperate parent drives into a fog-covered abandoned town searching for a missing child and encounters monsters that seem shaped by guilt and trauma.

Type: movie
Title: Talking Toys Jealous Cowboy
Year: 1995
Genres: animation family comedy
Description: A loyal cowboy toy fears being replaced when his owner receives a flashy space ranger action figure, leading to a rivalry that slowly turns into friendship.

Type: movie
Title: Dinosaur Theme Park Disaster
Year: 1993
Genres: sci-fi adventure thriller
Description: A remote island theme park filled with cloned dinosaurs descends into chaos when the power fails and the prehistoric creatures escape their enclosures.

Type: anime
Title: Angel Machine Pilots
Year: 1995
Genres: mecha psychological apocalyptic
Description: Teenagers pilot giant bio-mechanical weapons to fight mysterious angel-like beings attacking a futuristic fortified city while struggling with trauma and identity.

Type: anime
Title: Spirit Bathhouse Girl
Year: 2001
Genres: fantasy coming-of-age
Description: A stubborn young girl becomes trapped in a world of spirits and must work in a magical bathhouse to free her parents and return to the human world.

Type: tv
Title: Desert Chemistry Teacher
Year: 2008
Genres: drama crime thriller
Description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with cancer starts cooking illegal drugs with a former student in order to secure his family’s financial future.

Type: article
Title: Beginner’s Guide to Sourdough Bread
Year: 2020
Genres: food baking tutorial
Description: An introductory article that explains how to feed a sourdough starter, knead bread dough, and bake crusty loaves at home with step-by-step photos.

Type: article
Title: Stock Market Volatility Report
Year: 2021
Genres: finance economics news
Description: A financial news report summarizing recent stock index movements, central bank announcements, and investor sentiment in global markets.

Type: article
Title: Quantum Computing Basics
Year: 2019
Genres: technology science
Description: A popular-science explainer on qubits, superposition, entanglement, and how quantum computers differ from classical machines.

Type: article
Title: Python Dictionary Tutorial
Year: 2018
Genres: programming tutorial
Description: A step-by-step guide that teaches beginners how to use Python dictionaries, including keys, values, iteration, and common methods.

Type: article
Title: Weekend Guide to Paris
Year: 2017
Genres: travel city-guide
Description: A travel guide describing museums, cafes, historic neighborhoods, and tips for spending a long weekend exploring Paris on a budget.

Type: noise
Title: Random Word Cloud A
Year: 0
Genres: none
Description: banana nebula staircase velvet algorithm lantern moss window eclipse marble trumpet glacier library compass thunder pillow dragonfly cactus orbit noodle.
